text: You looked after my father in his final days and as a family, we wanted to show our appreciation to @NHSTaysideCEO @NHSTayside  In particular, the Ninewells ICU Covid-19 staff that risk their lives everyday to save ours. . If you like, show your appreciation and share ❤ https://t.co/GcbRG9PFbX
